Author: daintyasf-ck
Text: You are not alone. I was 20lbs away from GW last summer, learning to appreciate my body for what it could do instead of punishing it for what it could not.. I fully believed that I was going to be okay. And yet, I’m still me. I’m still flawed, I’m still learning how the fuck to exist successfully. The devastation of gaining seventy five pounds has been nothing short of humiliating, but I’m sticking in there.. because I know that eventually I’ll be okay.
